segments.text: What do you do besides work and watching TV ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I have some time , I like to exercise .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you go jogging or do you go to a health club ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I joined Samsung Health Club a couple of months ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I usually spend 30 minutes on the bicycle for the Carpio , and then I lift weight for about 45 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to go four times a week , but I'm too lazy . Last week , I only went to workout once .
segments.speaker: S2
